sentences.en: ‘When do you want me to leave?’ ‘No time like the present.’.
sentences.cn: “你想让我什么时候离开？”“就现在。”。

sentences.en: A spasm of pain brought his thoughts back to the present.
sentences.cn: 一阵剧痛把他的思绪拉回到了现在。

sentences.en: At present children under 14 are not permitted in bars.
sentences.cn: 目前，14岁以下儿童不允许进酒吧。

sentences.en: At the present time we have no explanation for this.
sentences.cn: 目前我们还无法解释这件事。

sentences.en: Both of them had the ability to present complex matters lucidly.
sentences.cn: 两人都具有深入浅出地表述复杂事物的能力。

sentences.en: Do you believe that sentences for criminals are tough enough at present?
sentences.cn: 你认为当前对罪犯的判决足够严厉吗？

sentences.en: Edinburgh Theatre Company presents ‘The Wind in the Willows’.
sentences.cn: 爱丁堡剧团上演《柳林风声》。

sentences.en: Foreign observers were present at the elections.
sentences.cn: 外国观察员出席了选举。

sentences.en: Gucci will be holding fashion shows to present their autumn collection.
sentences.cn: 古奇将举办时装发布会推出他们的秋装系列。

sentences.en: Hampton Court was made over to Henry VIII as a present.
sentences.cn: 汉普顿宫被作为礼物转送给了亨利八世。

sentences.en: he had made a present of a hacienda to the president.
sentences.cn: 他把一座大庄园作为礼物送给总统。

sentences.en: Her dream is to present a lifestyle show on television.
sentences.cn: 她的梦想是主持一档电视时尚生活节目。

sentences.en: I pushed the problem aside; at present it was insoluble.
sentences.cn: 我把问题抛在一边，目前它还无法解决。

sentences.en: I’m looking for a present for Mark.
sentences.cn: 我在找一份礼物送给马克。

sentences.en: In the present climate, owners are hanging on to old ships.
sentences.cn: 在目前的形势下，船东们都不愿淘汰掉旧船。

sentences.en: On January 3 the company will present its plans to the bank.
sentences.cn: 1 月3日该公司将向银行提交计划。

sentences.en: Several of those present, including Weinberger, had contrary information.
sentences.cn: 几个在场的人，包括温博格，所掌握的信息截然不同。

sentences.en: She was presented with an award .
sentences.cn: 她被授予一个奖项。

sentences.en: She was presented with an award.
sentences.cn: 她被授予一个奖项。

sentences.en: She will present the trophies to the award winners.
sentences.cn: 她将给获奖者颁奖。

sentences.en: Stop worrying about the past and live in the present.
sentences.cn: 别再为过去烦恼，好好地过眼前的日子。

sentences.en: The carpet was a wedding present from the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 这张地毯是首相送的结婚礼物。

sentences.en: The figures marked the final low point of the present economic cycle.
sentences.cn: 这些数据显示了目前经济周期的最低点。

sentences.en: the premises outlined in red on the Plan annexed to these presents.
sentences.cn: 附于本文件平面图上红笔勾勒的房屋连地基。

sentences.en: The present assembly will be dissolved on April 30th.
sentences.cn: 现在的议会将于4月30日解散。

sentences.en: the present situation of the millions of people who are suffering poverty and disease
sentences.cn: 遭受贫困和疾病折磨的数百万人民的现状

sentences.en: They said the present system of military conscription should be phased out.
sentences.cn: 他们说，当前的征兵体系应当逐步废除。

sentences.en: Thursday’s ‘The Late Show’ was presented by Cynthia Rose.
sentences.cn: 星期四的《深夜秀》是由辛茜娅·罗丝主持的。

words.tran_cn: 漂亮的；可见人的；有规矩的
表象的；演出的；上演的；直觉的
直示的，直接表示概念的
存在；出席；参加；风度；仪态
提出者；推荐者；赠送者；任命者

phrases.phrase: (there is) no time like the present

phrases.tran_cn: 全部都在；无一物（或人）丢失
净现值，现在净价值；纯现价
举枪对准某人瞄准，用(武器)对准某人

trans.tran_cn: 现在的，目前的，现在时的，出席的，在场的，包含于…的

trans.tran_en: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion
to give a performance in a theatre, cinema etc, or broadcast a programme on television or radio
